content:
The Chairman of the European Commission Ursula von Der Lyen strongly condemned Russia's rocket strike in Odessa at a time when President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy and Prime Minister of Greece Kiriakos Michotakis were visiting a visit.

She wrote about it on her Twitter page.

“I decisively condemn Russia's vicious attack on Odessa during the visit of President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky and Prime Minister of Greece Kiriakos Michokotakis. No one is scared by this new attempt by terror - exactly two leaders on the ground or the brave people of Ukraine. As ever we stand on the side of Ukraine, ”the Ursula Son Der Lyen reads.

I strongly condemn the vile attack on Odesa by Russia during@ZelenskyyUaand@Kmitsotakis‘s visit.

No one is intimidated by this new attempt at terror – certainly not the two leaders on the ground nor the brave people of Ukraine.

More than ever, we stand by Ukraine.

- Ursula von der Leyen (@vonderleyen)March 6, 2024

As reported by the Armyinform, the Chairman of the Euro CouncilcommentedThe blow of the Russian Federation on Odessa and stated that it was more than doing the Kremlin.
title: Ursula von der Liaien responded to Russia's missile stroke on Odessa
description: She wrote about it on her Twitter page. “I decisively condemn the sneaky attack ...
author: Army Inform
